PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2003-09742003-06-18,  ,  ,  INDUSTRY, 
ActBusiness Development Bank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Industry of JEAN-CLAUDE VILLIARD of Ottawa, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Business Development Bank of Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of V. Peter Harder, whose term has expired.
